name: Henry Quest
description:
Join Henry in his beautiful adventure across the galaxy in Henry Quest. Collect green tea boxes, but avoid the coffee!

CONTROLS

Level 1

Use arrow keys to move, and click around for easter eggs!

Level 2 (Get 3 stars on the first level)

Left-click to shoot, and space bar to fire the laser.

Parody game off of the video/song BRODYQUEST:
